Name: Shard
Desc:
Creates a fragment of magic that detects and flies towards the enemy. Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status..
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn Wonder

MP Cost: 20. Creates 5 magic fragments that attacks at 80% damage 3 times.
Cooldown: 6 sec.
